key_risk_themes: ["Multi-Tenancy Security & Data Isolation","Data Integrity for Offline & Automated Processes","Performance and Cost Scalability of Reporting Queries"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Mandate and resource comprehensive automated testing for all Firestore Security Rules to prevent data leakage.","Initiate a mandatory technical spike to finalize and validate the multi-region data residency architecture before implementation.","Design and enforce a server-side data aggregation strategy for all reporting features to mitigate performance and cost risks."]
